intro: Jurinea cretacea, commonly known as the Cretaceous jurinea, is a flowering plant belonging to the family Aizoaceae. It is characterized by its succulent, fleshy leaves and small, star-shaped flowers that typically bloom in shades of yellow or white. Native to arid and semi-arid regions, this plant is well adapted to drought conditions. Its growth habit is low and spreading, often forming dense mats on rocky or sandy soils. Jurinea cretacea is valued for its ornamental appeal and its ability to thrive in challenging environments.
